name: Jailbreak the Mass Media
tagline: Google Chrome extension to expose mass media concentration by replacing subsidiary media companies with the name of their parent company
body:
## Click here to automatically install

Jailbreak the Mass Media is a fork of ["Jailbreak the Patriarchy"](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/jailbreak-the-patriarchy/fiidcfoaaciclafodoficaofidfencgd?hl=en-US&gl=US) by Danielle Sucher. Suggestions and pull requests welcome.

Known issues:
* The subsidiary/parent data and mappings are all hard-coded but it would be nice to keep them up to date dynamically. Note there is a directory "scraper," which contains a few aborted efforts to write a scraper that could pull this data from Wikipedia pages. If you have any clue about how one could do something like that, please do let me know.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
